author: Ashley Oliver and Matthew Boyle
title: Analysis: Senate Majority May Come Down to 11 Battleground Races

author: Ashley Oliver and Matthew Boyle
title: Analysis: Senate Majority May Come Down to 11 Battleground Races

sentence: And Georgia's current governor, Brian Kemp, is being pushed further to the right on the issue by his primary challenger, David Perdue, the Trump-backed former senator.
title: Abortion is already starting to reshape these notable midterm campaigns.
